description: The NSQIP_READMISSION table contains readmission information for NSQIP registry data for the surgeries that are selected for NSQIP submission. It is used in conjunction with NSQIP_INFO table.

columns.name: REGISTRY_DATA_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the registry data record.

columns.name: CHILD_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name for a child record.

columns.name: CHILD_RECORD_ABBR
columns.description: The abbreviated name for a child record.

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_WITHIN_30_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether there was a readmission within 30 days of principal operative procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Yes


No

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_DT
columns.description: The readmission date.

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_DT_UNKWN_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the date of readmission is unknown.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_INFO_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the source of information for readmission.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Medical record


Patient/Family report


Other

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_UNPLANNED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the readmission was unplanned.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NSQIP_READM_WITHIN_30_YN

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_RELATED_YN
columns.description:
Indicates whether the readmission is related to the principal operative procedure.


 The category values for this column were already listed for column: NSQIP_READM_WITHIN_30_YN

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_REL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:
The category ID for the primary reason for readmission related to the principal operative procedure.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Post-op dialysis


Blood transfusion


Cardiac arrest requiring CPR


Deep incisional SSI


Venous thrombosis requiring therapy


Myocardial infarction


On ventilator > 48 hours


Pneumonia


Pulmonary embolism


Post-op renal insufficiency


Stroke/CVA


Superficial incisional SSI


Sepsis


Unplanned intubation


Urinary tract infection


Wound disruption


Organ/Space SSI


Septic shock


Other (list ICD-9 code)


Other (ICD-10 code)


C. diff

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_REL_RSN_ICD9
columns.description: The ICD-9 code associated with readmission reason if the readmission is related to the principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_REL_RSN_TXT
columns.description: The ICD-9 free text comment associated with readmission reason if the readmission is related to the principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_UNREL_RSN_C_NAME
columns.description:

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_UNREL_RSN_ICD9
columns.description: The ICD-9 code associated with readmission reason if the readmission is unrelated to the principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_UNREL_RSN_TXT
columns.description: The ICD-9 free text comment associated with readmission reason if the readmission is unrelated to the principal operative procedure.

columns.name: NSQIP_READM_REL_RSN_ICD10
columns.description: The ICD-10 code associated with readmission reason if the readmission is related to the principal operative procedure.

columns.description: The ICD-10 free text comment associated with readmission reason if the readmission is related to the principal operative procedure.

columns.name: RECORD_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
The record status (hidden, soft-deleted, etc...) category ID for the registry data record.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Soft Deleted


Hidden


Hidden and Soft Deleted
